name: Arcane Fusillade
desc:
Arcane energies fold around you and spin out into deadly seeking projectiles. Every creature you choose within range takes 1d4 arcane damage, and must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d4 arcane damage, halved on a success.

At the start of each of your turns, you can repeat the damaging effect if you use all your AP and movement for the turn. Otherwise, the spell ends.
